skill.efds.dualspear.tooltip:
A Skill that makes you hold 2 spears at the time
You can now swing around with 2 spears that does alot of damage and being unstoppable
skill.efds.slash.tooltip:
Perform a slamming motion with both spears simultaneously
Deals heavy damage and has a chance to stun enemies
skill.efds.dualtachi.tooltip: A Skill that makes you hold 2 spears at the time.
